data.label: Nails
data.description: Gel mani - Gel extension - Infills - Gel pedi - Pedi SPA

Services.description_service:
Put your nails in our hands! With this service, you will be able to enjoy perfectly manicured nails for up to 3 weeks after the appointment. Just sit back and relax in the comfort of your own home and let our Glambassadors style your nails as you please.

Your appointment includes:

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Removal of old polish
-	Cuticle care
-	Buff and nail shaping 
-	Application of gel polish of your choice
-	Application of cuticle oil

How to prepare?

In order to best enjoy your experience, please find an area around a table with two chairs. Your Glambassador will also need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Do you want to enjoy beautiful long nails? Use our service to get that effect you’ve been dreaming about. Our Glambassadors will give you the perfect shape and style – our goal is to satisfy even the most demanding clients.

Your appointment includes:

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Removal of old polish
-	Cuticle care
-	Buff and nail shaping 
-	Gel extension using form sticker
-	Application of gel polish of your choice
-	Application of cuticle oil

How to prepare?

In order to best enjoy your experience, please find an area around a table with two chairs. Your Glambassador will also need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

A natural and elegant manicure? Or some nail art that everyone will notice? Our Glambassadors will come to your address with a full kit so don’t worry about not having a choice! Also, don’t forget to select additional options so we can book the necessary time for you.

Your appointment includes:

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Removal of old polish
-	Cuticle care
-	Buff and nail shaping 
-	Gel infills 
-	Application of gel polish of your choice
-	Application of cuticle oil

How to prepare?

In order to best enjoy your experience, please find an area around a table with two chairs. Your Glambassador will also need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Beautiful nails are not strictly reserved for your hands! Let our Glambassadors take care of your feet, and enjoy a relaxing pedicure in the comfort of your own home.

Your appointment includes:

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Removal of old polish
-	Feet soak and removal of calluses
-	Cuticle care
-	Buff and nail shaping 
-	Application of gel polish of your choice

How to prepare?

Find a place where you can sit comfortably and relax. Your Glambassador will need a chair, towel and an electrical outlet close by for his tools. In order to soak your feet, you will also need to provide a basin or bowl.

How about some time to relax after a long day? Our Glambassadors will make sure you’ll enjoy beautiful nails and a relaxing moment of pampering thanks to our full SPA treatment for your feet.

Your appointment includes:

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Removal of old polish
-	Feet soak and removal of calluses
-	Scrub and exfoliating massage
-	Moisturizing lotion
-	Cuticle care
-	Buff and nail shaping 
-	Application of gel polish of your choice

How to prepare?

Find a place where you can sit comfortably and relax. Your Glambassador will need a chair, towel and an electrical outlet close by for his tools. In order to soak your feet, you will also need to provide a basin or bowl.

An important business meeting? Or maybe an elegant lunch with friends? No matter what the occasion, our Glambassadors will bring out your natural beauty and hide those little imperfections.

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Cleansing and prepping your skin 
-	Application of right foundation and concealer to give you that natural glowing look
-	Delicate contour 
-	Defining your eyes  
-	Defining your brows
-	Application of lipstick or lip gloss in nude tones  
-	Application of a makeup setting spray to make you look flawless all day long

How to prepare? 

In order for the makeup to be as lasting as possible, we advise you to gently exfoliate your face and lips and moisturize your skin 24 hours before your appointment. For this session, you will simply need a chair for yourself and some space for the Glambassador to lay out his products. If possible, please remove all your makeup before the appointment. We would also like to ask you to pay attention to the lighting – please set up your chair as close as possible to a natural source of light.

We want to be there for you for those big events! Our Glambassadors will do everything they can to make you look stunning: glitter, red lips, full contour…tell us what you need and we will do it!

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Cleansing and prepping your skin 
-	Application of a full coverage foundation and concealer 
-	A powder contour of your face using a bronzer, blush and highlighter
-	Defining your eyes  
-	Defining your brows
-	Application of lipstick or lip gloss 
-	Application of a makeup setting spray to make you look flawless all night long

How to prepare? 

In order for the makeup to be as lasting as possible, we advise you to gently exfoliate your face and lips and moisturize your skin 24 hours before your appointment. For this session, you will simply need a chair for yourself and some space for the Glambassador to lay out his products. If possible, please remove all your makeup before the appointment. We would also like to ask you to pay attention to the lighting – please set up your chair as close as possible to a natural source of light.

Are you dreaming of a salon quality blowout but you can’t leave your house or office? No problem, we will come to you. Our Glambassadors will make sure your hair looks beautifully glossy! 

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	A blowout using a round brush, curling iron or flat iron
-	Setting your blowout with hairspray 

How to prepare? 

For your own comfort, this appointment does not include a wash– we kindly ask you to have your hair pre-washed (at home) or we will damp-spritz it (in office). For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Straight, curly or maybe lots of volume? Our Glambassadors will make sure you are satisfied with the final result without having to leave your house. Sit back, relax and let us take care of your hair.

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	A blowout using a round brush, curling iron or flat iron
-	Setting your blowout with hairspray 

How to prepare? 

For your own comfort, this appointment does not include a wash– we kindly ask you to have your hair pre-washed (at home) or we will damp-spritz it (in office). For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

A big event is the perfect opportunity to do something for yourself. Half up, braided updo or sleek bun…there is so much to choose from! Your Glambassador can accommodate you with a hairstyle you’ve picked from a photo or advise you on what will look best given your outfit, your hair and the occasion.

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	An updo that will match your beauty and personality 
-	Setting your updo with hairspray 

How to prepare? 

For your own comfort, this appointment does not include a wash – we kindly ask you to have your hair pre-washed and dried. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

At MyGlam we always follow the hottest trends – that is why we couldn’t imagine not having braids in our offer. Our Glambassadors can provide you with a braided style that goes for any occasion – so now, do you want a romantic look or a trendy one?

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	A braided style that will make you look fashionable for any occasion 
-	Setting your braids with hairspray 

How to prepare? 

For your own comfort, this appointment does not include a wash – we kindly ask you to have your hair pre-washed and dried. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Perfectly smooth legs are what you’re wishing for right now? Done. Our Glambassadors will come to you, so you will be able to enjoy a wax appointment at home. Don’t forget to check our additional options on the following page – you’ll find all the smaller areas that we wax! 

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Waxing of the chosen area(s)

How to prepare? 

All you need is a big towel and a place where you can comfortably lay down. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Do you want to get rid of your hair on your face? Done. Our Glambassadors will come to you, so you will be able to enjoy a wax appointment at home. Don’t forget to check our additional options on the following page – you’ll find all the smaller areas that we wax! 

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Waxing of the chosen area(s)

How to prepare? 

All you need is a big towel and a place where you can comfortably lay down. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Do you want to get rid of your hair on your arms? Done. Our Glambassadors will come to you, so you will be able to enjoy a wax appointment at home. Don’t forget to check our additional options on the following page – you’ll find all the smaller areas that we wax! 

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Waxing of the chosen area(s)

How to prepare? 

All you need is a big towel and a place where you can comfortably lay down. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

In just a few minutes we will take care of your bikini area, and all this in the comfort of your own home. Don’t forget to check our additional options on the following page – you’ll find all the smaller areas that we wax! 

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Waxing of the chosen area(s)

How to prepare? 

All you need is a big towel and a place where you can comfortably lay down. Also, we kindly ask you to take a hot shower prior to your appointment. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

In just a few minutes we will take care of your bikini area, and all this in the comfort of your own home. Don’t forget to check our additional options on the following page – you’ll find all the smaller areas that we wax! 

Your appointment includes: 

-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	Waxing of the chosen area(s)

How to prepare? 

All you need is a big towel and a place where you can comfortably lay down. Also, we kindly ask you to take a hot shower prior to your appointment. For this service, your Glambassador will need an electrical outlet close by for his tools.

Perfectly shaped brows are a must, and our Glambassadors will gladly help you achieve your dream result. With threading, you can enjoy now perfectly styled brows for up to 4 weeks – the treatment is painless and safe for all skin types, even the most sensitive ones. All that of course, with a free delivery to your doorstep, in the comfort of your own home and adapted to your schedule.

Your appointment includes:
-	A consultation with your Glambassador
-	Defining the perfect shape for your brows with your eyes and face
-	Styling your brows with a threading technique.

How to prepare?

For your session you will simply need a regular or a reclining chair – please pay attention to the lighting and place yourself as close to daylight as possible. A strong contraindication for this service is an acute inflammation or infectious skin condition.

If your lashes are difficult, but you don’t think lash extensions are for you, then we have the perfect solution. With a lash lift, you’ll be able to enjoy curled and accentuated lashes - the optical effect of them being longer is just an added bonus! All that comfortably, in your house and on your time.

Your appointment includes:
-	A consultation with your Glambassador 
-	A lash lift, which uplifts your lashes from the base
-	Lash tint, to make them darker and more remarkable
-	Lash botox, to hydrate and strengthen them
-	Nourishing conditioner, to close up the lash

How to prepare?

Before ordering this service, please make sure you do not present any contraindications (any eye allergies, total lack of lashes, trichotillomania, dry eye syndrome, conjunctivitis, cataracts, glaucoma). Also, please remove your lenses and eye makeup. For this service, you will need to lay down – a bed or reclining chair will be perfect. Access to water is also necessary.
